channel.title: Kenyan Community in Scotland
channel.description: Discover and participate in events organized by the Kenyan Community in Scotland.

item.title: Kenyan Community Networking Mixer
item.description:
Join us for an afternoon of networking, learning, and connection in Edinburgh! All members are welcome.

Back to top

item.title: Community Networking Event - Edinburgh
item.description:
Join us for an exciting networking event in Edinburgh, where members of the Kenyan Community in Scotland come together to connect, share, and inspire.

Highlights: - Networking opportunities - Sharing professional experiences - Building lasting community connections

Stay tuned for more events like this!
